description: This file declares functions related to controlling channel selection in a wireless networking context, including setting, updating, and dumping channel information.

methods.name: map_ctrl_chan_sel_set
methods.description: Updates controller preference and sends a channel selection request with specified radio info, channels, bandwidth, and ACS enable flag.

methods.name: map_ctrl_chan_sel_set_channel
methods.description: Sets the channel for the specified radio.

methods.name: map_ctrl_chan_sel_set_bandwidth
methods.description: Sets the bandwidth for the specified radio.

methods.name: map_ctrl_chan_sel_update
methods.description: Updates controller preference without sending a channel selection request.

methods.name: map_ctrl_chan_sel_dump
methods.description: Prints the channel selection information for debugging or logging.

methods.name: map_ctrl_chan_sel_fini
methods.description: Finalizes and cleans up the channel selection module.
